WorkItem.Description:
Hi here,
Just downloaded the project as it seems to be a really good project to get my head around with MVC.
Here's the situation :
- I have VS2008 running + framework 3.5
- Installed MVC 2
- Downloaded the Kigg project. 
- Trying to open V2.X with VS2008
- Every other projects in the directory loads alright but Kigg.Web.[ Error message is : Kigg.Web.csproj cannot be opened. This project type is not supported by this installation. ]

Question is:
- Is it due to MVC 2 ? Cause one of my mate could successfully open it using MVC + VS2008.
- How do I resolve it ? (other than uninstalling MVC2 and installing MVC)

Thanks for your help.
WorkItem.Summary: Failed opening KiGG.Web with VS2008 MVC2

Comments.Message: Try again with the current source code.

Have tried it with the recent release! Because recent build was made with MVC 2.0 on VS2008. You issue was resolved long time ago actually, I wonder if you had the recent source code at that time.
Anyway recent build and release works fine with VS2008 having MVC 2.0 installed.
